text: Claire Trevor (March 8, 1910 â€“ April 8, 2000) was an American movie actress. She usually played "bad girl" roles in movies. She received an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role as a hopeless alcoholic in the movie Key Largo. She also received nominations for her roles in the movies The High and the Mighty and Dead End. She was in over sixty movies. Trevor was born Claire Wemlinger in New York City. She died due to respiratory failure at age ninety in California. title: Claire Trevor
